content.html:
Hi, I'm Ari Bader-Natal. I design, build, and operate online learning environments that help people access new opportunities and create new futures.
I am co-founder and CTO at Sparkwise, where I lead product and engineering. We power multiplayer training where people actively learn by solving challenges together.
From 2019-2021, I served as the founding CTO at Calbright College. Calbright is a fully-online competency-based college in the California Community Colleges system designed for working adults who lack easy access to traditional forms of higher education.
Before this, I served as Chief Learning Scientist at Minerva Project. I joined Minerva as Employee #1 in 2012, and spent 7 years creating new tools to support learning and teaching, including Minerva's first Active Learning Forum, tools for formative assessment, and collaborative curriculum authoring system.
In 2010, I built Studio Sketchpad, a place for creative coders to collaboratively create interactive animations in Processing (and later P5.js.) In addition to serving as a venue for informal learning, Sketchpad has been used by 100+ universities, high schools, and coding workshops. Notably, this service has been running for 12+ years.
Recently liked:

Ari Bader-Natal 

Hi, I'm Ari Bader-Natal. I design, build, and operate online learning environments that help people access new opportunities and create new futures.

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: The AI panic is spreading in education. Released without guidance or clear suggestions for educators near the end of a school semester, the rapid adoption of ChatGPT might be among the largest, fastest transformations in education1.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: How to… use AI to teach some of the hardest skills

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: As I mentioned last time, the Steampipe dashboard for Mastodon has evolved in unexpected ways.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: A Bloomberg terminal for Mastodon

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: “The College Essay Is Dead.” So declared Stephen Marche in The Atlantic, about how the time-honored tradition will be “disrupted from the ground up” by ChatGPT, an AI chatbot capable of generating college-level written responses.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: GPT and a New Generation of AI for Education

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: Annotation should be the killer feature of digital reading. Instead, highlighting, tagging, & note-taking are neglected afterthoughts in other reading apps. We believe that annotations are the key to getting more out of what you read. So we’ve developed highlighting as a first-class feature.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: The first read-it-later app built for power readers.

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: In the future, any time you look up information you’re going to use a chatbot. This applies to every piece of information you interact with day to day: personal, organizational, and cultural.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: I Built an AI Chatbot Based On My Favorite Podcast

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: Five years ago I was sitting around drinking a beer with my college buddy Dayv. I was scrolling through Twitter and watching people get mad at Donald Trump’s latest outrage, and I said “You know…fifteen years ago, the internet was an escape from the real world.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: The internet wants to be fragmented

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: I worked at Amazon for five years, leaving days before receiving the coveted yellow badge. Most people don’t make it past the first year.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: The Anatomy of an Amazon 6-pager

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: The recruiter was a chipper woman with a master’s degree in English. Previously she had worked as an independent bookseller. “Your experience as an English grad student is ideal for this role,” she told me. The position was at a company that made artificial intelligence for real estate.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: Becoming a chatbot: my life as a real estate AI’s human backup

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/twit.title: There is something a bit bizarre about proving that you are not a robot, when trying to log in to ChatGPT… 🙂

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: You can’t add more hours to the day. Zapier is the next best thing. By signing up, you agree to Zapier’s terms of service and privacy policy.

Dramatron is a system that uses large language models that could be useful for authors for co-writing theatre scripts and screenplays. Dramatron uses hierarchical story generation for consistency across the generated text.

Please read about Dramatron before continuing, and give us a ⭐ on GitHub. For more complex interactions (edit history, choice of prompts, etc.), please check out this Colab. You’ll need an OpenAI API key to use Dramatron.

If you want to build a sustaining advantage in AI the conventional wisdom says you have to build the technology required for a powerful model. But a powerful model is not just a function of technology. It’s also a function of your willingness to get sued.
The results of this year’s McKinsey Global Survey on AI show the expansion of the technology’s use since we began tracking it five years ago, but with a nuanced picture underneath.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: The state of AI in 2022—and a half decade in review
